subject: Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A van carrying a Canadian high school boys’ team collided with a truck Saturday in Bathurst, New Brunswick, killing seven students and the coach’s wife on their way home from a game.The police said the seven players were pronounced dead at the crash site after their van crossed the center line and hit the tractor-trailer shortly after midnight.
